https://tmrev.io/movie/446200-Cleaver: Rise of the Killer Clown 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wVgbBGEBmK4zFaqtsi6gtkgPRm9.jpg When Carlton Layton arrives home to find his wife in the arms of another man, he dons the outfit he wears as a children's entertainer and slaughters them both, fleeing into the night. Five years later, Carley Lewis is asked to babysit on Halloween night whilst the child's parents go out to a party. But someone wants the child. Someone we know only as "The Cleaver". Cleaver: Rise of the Killer Clown
